definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Oil-based lubricants can weaken latex condoms and cause them to break.
sentences.chinese: 油基潤滑劑會削弱橡膠安全套並引起破裂。

sentences.english: Seriously? I thought. Condoms for kids?
sentences.chinese: 此話當真？我在想。孩子用的安全套？

sentences.english: Do you think “Hotshot” condoms will ever make a visit to the U.S.?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲“Hotshot”安全套會造訪美國嗎？

sentences.english: Condoms are a big no-no; they’re bad for business.
sentences.chinese: 安全套是一個最大的禁忌，因爲不利於他們的生意。

sentences.english: Lack of lubrication can also cause condom breakage.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏潤滑同時可能導致安全套破裂。

sentences.english: There is a need to be very careful in handling water-filled condoms, however.
sentences.chinese: 只是裝滿水的安全套處理起來需要非常小心。

sentences.english: Use latex or polyurethane condoms only to protect against HIV.
sentences.chinese: 只有乳膠或聚亞安酯安全套可以預防HIV。

sentences.english: Especially the MSM crowd condom use is only about 20%.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是男男性接觸人羣安全套使用率只有20%左右。

sentences.english: HIV is passed on by sex without condoms.
sentences.chinese: 愛滋病是經由不用安全套的性接觸傳染。

sentences.english: Second, make sure the condom has not reached its expiration date.
sentences.chinese: 第二，確保安全套沒有過保質期。

sentences.english: You have to pull out, take the condom off, and get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 你必須抽出來，取下安全套，徹底擺脫它。

sentences.english: A female condom equalizes control by a small but significant amount.
sentences.chinese: 女用安全套的數量雖少卻有着十分重要的意義。

sentences.english: "Disband Dinner" takes condoms as souvenir, what's your view?
sentences.chinese: 高校散夥飯安全套做紀念，你怎麼看？

sentences.english: Kimono Condoms surpass international standards for durability and strength.
sentences.chinese: 和服安全套在耐久性與韌性上已超過了國際標準。

sentences.english: First, you need to make sure that you properly store your condoms.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你必須保證你適當地儲放了你的安全套。

sentences.english: The pill is the choice of most women, followed by condoms and sterilisation.
sentences.chinese: 多數女人選擇避孕藥，次之是安全套和內置節育器。

definition: sterilized absorbent cotton wool (used for dressings or cleansing wounds)/sanitary napkin/tampon
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
